about_the_game:
MechDefender is an innovative fusion of two gaming genres - seamlessly blending the intense action of a top-down shooter with the strategic depth of tower defense. Step into the cockpit of powerful Mechs and embark on a heroic mission to safeguard your homeland against unrelenting waves of alien undead. To vanquish these otherworldly foes, you'll need cunning tactics and an arsenal of devastating weaponry.

In this gripping Sci-Fi showdown, you'll take charge of building, enhancing, and fortifying your base of operations while simultaneously engaging in thrilling battles. Your primary objectives: protect your headquarters, eradicate the relentless undead hordes, and fortify your towers' power cores.

Explore four captivating campaigns, featuring over 50 diverse missions, each presenting its unique challenges. Utilize a variety of tower types and customize your formidable robots with upgrades to maximize your defenses.

Select from an array of Mech models, each with its unique attributes, including Thunder, Fury, Revenant, and Punisher. Construct intricate deathtrap mazes, elevate your skills to deadly proficiency, and invest in cutting-edge weapons of mass destruction to ensure your base's survival against impending doom. MechDefender offers an exhilarating blend of action and strategy that will keep you on the edge of your seat throughout your quest to save humanity from annihilation.
